Dear [fullname],

We are looking forward to working with you! Welcome letter saved to: src/resources/out/WelcomeTestEmployee.txt File contents: Welcome to test company!
Dear Test Employee,
We are all really excited to welcome you to our team! As agreed, your start date will be 2022-08-30 and your starting salary is $100000. We expect to see you in our offices at test company.
We are looking forward to working with you!
